name: Ad-Venn-ture
description:
Ad-Venn-ture is a game made during the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

The main characters Henrietta and Susan are "Joined Together" in a Venn Diagram. Each of them has a sphere that surrounds them and they can never leave the other person's sphere. It's your job to navigate them from point A to point B in this very simple puzzle game.
